# pathCompleted(at:)

**Instance Method**

Triggers feedback to indicate path completion or shape recognition.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func pathCompleted(at location: CGPoint)
```

## Reporting canvas events

- **alignmentOccurred(at:)**: Triggers feedback to indicate when an alignment occurs, such as snapping an object to a guide or ruler.
